page.title: 08Hill Of Beath School Life
page.content: old people of the village.On Thursdays Mr Wishart the art teacher comes to our class to do some art with us.He teaches us how to look carefully at what we are drawing.On Mondays Mr McIntyre the music teacher comes to teach us new songs and new instrument parts. He plays the piano at our end of term services.On Fridays we have P.E. Mrs. Bruce the P.E. teacher teaches us basket ball,bench ball and gymnastics.Near the end of each summer term we go on trips. This year we went to Edinburgh Castle and Rosyth Naval Dockyard.In February some 5,6 and 7 pupils went to Ardroy in Argyll.We got abseiling,hiking and mapwork.It was exhausting but good fun.We got a shower when we got back because we were hot.After that we got our supper and went to our beds.
